title: Top Places to visit in Renigunta, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Renigunta is a census town in Chittoor District of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a suburb of Tirupati and the Mandal headquarters of Renigunta Mandal.

 

Transport

Main articles: Renigunta Junction railway station and Tirupati Airport

The town has road connectivity by means of national and state highways. Kadapa Chennai National Highway 716 (India) NH 716 connects the town with Chennai in Tamil Nadu and National Highway 71 passes through the town that connects Madanapalle with Nayudupeta road. Bus services operated by APSRTC provides local transport for the people. Renigunta Junction is one of the main junctions that connect the Chennai-Bangalore line and the Guntakal–Chennai Egmore section of the Mumbai–Chennai line. It is also connected to Gudur on the Vijayawada-Chennai line of the Howrah-Chennai mainline. Tirupati Airport serves passengers of Tirupati.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools is English, Telugu.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Renigunta

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Samalkot, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Samalkota is a town in East Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The town also forms a part of the Godavari Urban Development Authority. Previously spelled as Samulcottah.

recommendations.content:
Punganur is a town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Punganur Mandal in Madanapalle revenue division

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Narsipatnam, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Narsipatnam is a town in the Visakhapatnam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It was upgraded by a gram panchayat into a municipality in 2012. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
